title: Complaining about scope creep
context: Tell a client that their new requests will cost extra money.

content.bestLine: New requests will incur additional costs

neutral.text: This is outside the original scope
I'll need to adjust the price
Not part of the initial agreement

formal.text: The new requests fall outside the original scope of work
I must inform you that additional costs will be incurred
The changes will require a revised agreement
Please note that the extra work will impact the project budget
I recommend we review the project scope and adjust the contract accordingly
The new requirements will necessitate a change order

patterns.meaning: informing the client of extra costs

patterns.template: I'll need to [options] to accommodate the new requirements

dialogs.description: Discussing scope creep with a client

lines.speaker: Freelancer
lines.text: I've reviewed the new requests, and they will require additional costs

lines.speaker: Freelancer
lines.text: The new requests fall outside the original scope of work, and I'll need to adjust the price accordingly

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: I understand that the new requests will incur extra costs, but can we discuss the details?

lines.speaker: Freelancer
lines.text: Of course, let's review the project scope and adjust the contract accordingly

lines.speaker: Client
lines.text: That sounds reasonable, please provide a revised estimate
